alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 5:20AM AKST until February 18 at 11:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM AKST FRIDAY NORTH AND EAST OF GAKONA... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches are expected, especially along the Tok Highway through Slana and Mentasta Lake and along the Richardson Highway in the Paxson area. * WHERE...Copper River Basin north of Gakona. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 11 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the Copper River Basin from southwest to northeast this morning. The greatest snowfall totals are expected from the junction of the Richardson Highway and Tok Cutoff northward, including Paxson.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
